headline: Does T-Mobile US' (TMUS) AI-Powered Switching Experience Redefine Its Subscriber Growth Potential?
summary: In late November 2025, T-Mobile US introduced "Switching Made Easy" and major T-Life app upgrades, enabling a faster, AI-driven switching process and same-day device delivery in key cities. This initiative leverages artificial intelligence and exclusive customer perks to tackle the long-standing challenges of switching carriers, positioning T-Mobile to attract new subscribers amid rising industry competition. We'll explore how T-Mobile's AI-powered switching experience and expanded app...

headline: T-Mobile will soon make it harder to contact customer service
summary: Over the past few weeks, T-Mobile has made it clear that it is heading in a new direction, following a significant leadership change and heightened customer losses. On Nov. 1, Srini Gopalan officially became CEO of T-Mobile, replacing Mike Sievert, who held the position for over five years. Sievert ...
